CustomField.formula:
IF( Opportunity__r.Site_Approved_Date__c < Date(2019,6,20), 1,
IF( OR(Opportunity__r.Installation_Complete_Date__c > Date(2019,11,6),ISBLANK(Opportunity__r.Installation_Complete_Date__c) = True), 1,
1.1)
)
* ( Opportunity__r.Total_Adders_Quote__c )
CustomField.label: Reroof/Structural/Electrical UpgradeCalc
